Title: SALE! Red Scarlet Flower Handmade Hair Pin Brooch Resin Kanzashi Stick Bridal
Description: Hot Summer Sale! Red Scarlet Flower Hair Pin / BroochThe Scarlet Flower shines with 50 shades of red, from maroon to vermilion. Big red stained glass style petals surround three little light pink petals that hide pearl in the middle of the flower. The item is medium size, placed on a long needle with safe cap. Such a pin allows to use the flower as a part of hairstyle.The item is very light and durable. It does not break if it falls. It is made of wire, synthetic resin, pearl and findings. The brooch / hair pin is absolutely unique and made with love.The flower with pin is 4 1/2 inch (11.5 cm) long. The pin length is 3 1/4 inch (8.5 cm)The flower size is 1 3/4 x 1 3/4 inch (4.3 x 4.3 cm).The item is very light and durable. It does not break if it falls. The brooch / hair pin is a real eye catcher. Ready to ship.Please note that I tried to represent the color as best as I could, but the color of hair pin may appear slightly different from what you see on your display.Packaging Your purchased item comes in a beautiful box with ribbon - ideal for a present.Shipping Economy and Express international shipping available - please check shipping details. Any questions please contact me.Treatment rulesThe item is quite solid however it can be damaged under strong pressure or near fire or heat. If the petals get bended you can accurately bend them back. Please keep away from hair sprays.In order the item does not get dusty please keep it in the original box. Your can clean dust with soft tissue or shake off with soft brush.The item is washable. Please use warm soapy water and clean water after that. Please avoid acids and solvents. Dry it at usual room temperature. Never use dryer and do not heat the item. Please see my other beautiful handmade jewelry
